alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:19PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN DUVAL...SOUTHERN LA SALLE...NORTHEASTERN WEBB AND SOUTHWESTERN MCMULLEN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 716 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Loma Alta to 8 miles southeast of Fort Ewell Site to 7 miles south of Artesia Wells. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Encinal and Fort Ewell Site. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 39 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
